typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		Year as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Sales as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourcesalses
sourcesalses derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(Country,6),'()')),
		Country = toString(left(Country,length(Country)-6))) ~> DerivedColumnsales
DerivedColumnsales sort(asc(Country, true)) ~> Sort1
DerivedColumnsales sort(asc(Sales, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort1 sink(input(
		Id as string,
		Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sortbycountry.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkderived
Sort2 sink(input(
		Id as string,
		Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sortbysales'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinksalessort
